name: unassociated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not connected with something: Back pain that is unassociated with posture or movement should be investigated further. How many different, apparently unassociated factors might come together in one of those blinding flashes of inspiration? Opposite
associated
More examplesFewer examplesDeaths in these patients result more often from unassociated diseases than from the primary disease itself.Chronic pain is continuous, and unassociated with the physiological responses to acute pain.The buyer may be a financial consortium that is unassociated with any of the big motor manufacturers.
